distances.primary

Class CombinedMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.CombinedMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageMetricsFromClustering, LocalScalingCalculator, MutualProximityCalculator, NICDMCalculator, SharedNeighborCalculator, SparseCombinedMetric

    public class CombinedMetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a way to combine the distances between the integer and float parts of the data representation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
